label: Court update
title: Jail for man who yelled homophobic abuse at Chatham protest
summary: A man who yelled homophobic abuse at police officers during a protest in Chatham has become the first person in Kent to be jailed following the recent spate of national disorder.

label: Court update
title: New approach to prosecuting adult rape cases in South East leads to more cases being charged
summary: New figures from CPS internal data shows that the number of rape referrals made by Kent, Surrey and Sussex Police has almost trebled in the last three years.
